channel.title: ATTACK: FRIENDLY FIRE
channel.description:
DJ Frienddy Fire and DJ Bramsterdam are big lovers of house music... Our DJ-ing is inspired by great parties such as Amsterdam Furball, Köln Cockpit and Manchester GBBB. Our parties are filled with energy, fun, temptation and climax! Music is the answer...
COME AND MEET US AT LOVE DANCE @ PARADISO AMSTERDAM DECEMBER 1ST
www.lovedance.nl
channel.itunes:subtitle: Enjoy our valley of house!!
channel.itunes:author: DJ's Big General and Bramsterdam
channel.itunes:summary:
DJ Frienddy Fire and DJ Bramsterdam are big lovers of house music... Our DJ-ing is inspired by great parties such as Amsterdam Furball, Köln Cockpit and Manchester GBBB. Our parties are filled with energy, fun, temptation and climax! Music is the answer...
COME AND MEET US AT LOVE DANCE @ PARADISO AMSTERDAM DECEMBER 1ST
www.lovedance.nl

item.title: Furball the Workers Edition
item.description: We're are ready for a new Furball in Amsterdam! On Friday January 14th, starting at 11PM at the fantastic Westerunie, it is time for another spectacular FURBALL! Line-up: Jimmie Stokes (XXXLeather, The One X) Bramsterdam & Big General (Furball, SuperSize(d) AMSTERDAM) Spectacular lasers by Matahari Laser Show Kick off is at 11PM at the WesterUnie, Klonne Plein 4 in Amsterdam. Get your tickets at the usual pre-sale addresses: De Engel van Amsterdam, Pink Point, Mister B, Rob, Prik, Gays and Gadgets and of course at Cuts and Curls. And online at www.furball.nl NO dress code, but he who makes an effort will be rewarded!
item.dc:creator: DJ's Big General and Bramsterdam
item.itunes:summary:
We're are ready for a new Furball in Amsterdam! On Friday January 14th, starting at 11PM at the fantastic Westerunie, it is time for another spectacular FURBALL!
Line-up:
Jimmie Stokes (XXXLeather, The One X) Bramsterdam & Big General (Furball, SuperSize(d) AMSTERDAM)
Spectacular lasers by Matahari Laser Show
Kick off is at 11PM at the WesterUnie, Klonne Plein 4 in Amsterdam.
Get your tickets at the usual pre-sale addresses: De Engel van Amsterdam, Pink Point, Mister B, Rob, Prik, Gays and Gadgets and of course at Cuts and Curls.
And online at www.furball.nl
NO dress code, but he who makes an effort will be rewarded!

item.title: Getting ready for Queens Day in Amsterdam
item.description: Check out our latest podcast: http://www.weloveyourears.podomatic.com (yes, we have moved!) We're getting ready for Queens Day madness in Amsterdam. Doing a Furball Outdoor at Zeedijk in the afternoon.... Time - X-Press Chris Lake and LYS - Sloane Francesco Diaz and X-Static – I’m standing Back to NY Dj Chus and Rob Mirage – Back 2 NY Libex – Liftered Ticon - Models on Cocaine Temper Trap – Sweet disposition Jerome Isma-Ae – Hold that sucker down Meck – Feels like a prayer Eric Prydz meets Alex Moreno - Leave the pjanoo behind http://www.weloveyourears.com
item.dc:creator: DJ's Big General and Bramsterdam
item.itunes:summary:
Check out our latest podcast: http://www.weloveyourears.podomatic.com (yes, we have moved!)
We're getting ready for Queens Day madness in Amsterdam. Doing a Furball Outdoor at Zeedijk in the afternoon....
Time - X-Press Chris Lake and LYS - Sloane Francesco Diaz and X-Static – I’m standing Back to NY Dj Chus and Rob Mirage – Back 2 NY Libex – Liftered Ticon - Models on Cocaine Temper Trap – Sweet disposition Jerome Isma-Ae – Hold that sucker down Meck – Feels like a prayer Eric Prydz meets Alex Moreno - Leave the pjanoo behind
http://www.weloveyourears.com

item.title: FURBALL DOWN UNDER
item.description: We're getting ready for our next parties in Amsterdam and Sydney! My latest podcast includes the tracks you'll hear often on our dance floors. Inpetto's 'Milky Way', Mark Knight's remake of 'Downpipe', Oliver Moldan's 'South Beach Shuttle' and Jerome Isma-Ae's remake of 'Hold that sucker down'. Enjoy and... don't forget to vote! Greetings from Amsterdam. DJ Big General. For our next parties: http://www.weloveyourears.nl Supersize[d] at Club Church (Amsterdam, January 16) Furball Polar Bear Edition (Amsterdam, January 22) Furball Down Under (Sydney, February 27) Underbear (Sydney, March 3) Furball the Kilt Edition (Amsterdam, March 19) And many more to follow
item.dc:creator: DJ's Big General and Bramsterdam
item.itunes:summary:
We're getting ready for our next parties in Amsterdam and Sydney! My latest podcast includes the tracks you'll hear often on our dance floors. Inpetto's 'Milky Way', Mark Knight's remake of 'Downpipe', Oliver Moldan's 'South Beach Shuttle' and Jerome Isma-Ae's remake of 'Hold that sucker down'.
Enjoy and... don't forget to vote!

item.title: Amsterdam Pride Anthems 2009
item.description: Swimming Place -Julien Jabre Chime -Shapeshifters Love On My Mind- Freemasons My Life - Chanel Alright - Red alert Riding The Waves - Sunfreakz Violins - Chris Lake and LYS Hello Piano - Inkfish and David West Take me away - Stonebridge Show Me Love -Robin S When Love Takes Over - David Guetta I Feel Love - Kevin Duvall A one time only! The anthems for Amsterdam Gay Pride 2010. Check out the website: http://www.weareproud.nl/ Or: http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=66821092822&ref=ts
item.dc:creator: DJ's Big General and Bramsterdam
item.itunes:summary:
Swimming Place -Julien Jabre Chime -Shapeshifters Love On My Mind- Freemasons My Life - Chanel Alright - Red alert Riding The Waves - Sunfreakz Violins - Chris Lake and LYS Hello Piano - Inkfish and David West Take me away - Stonebridge Show Me Love -Robin S When Love Takes Over - David Guetta I Feel Love - Kevin Duvall
A one time only! The anthems for Amsterdam Gay Pride 2010.
Check out the website: http://www.weareproud.nl/
Or: http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=66821092822&ref=ts
